item.description:
Just a harmless night of Pool & Martinis - you can have whatever beverage you wish. But martinis will be on the specials menu... The pool table is in the living room which is open to the dining room and kitchen which makes it great for hanging out and playing pool or chatting about all the christmas presents we have to return.

BYOB as always. I will have some food but if anyone wants to bring a some apps, snacks or fun finger food - it will be welcome - just let me know what you want to bring so we don't end up with 47 bags of Doritos.

Anyone have a favorite martini? Cosmo will be on the menu but one other speicailty would be nice.

Thanks - R

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Booze & Billiards @ Roger's House
